title: Villa for Rent at Affordable Price
description:
Secure this beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom villa rental located in the serene and sought-after area of Budanilkantha. Offering approximately 1800 sq ft of living space across 2 floors, it's perfect for families seeking comfort, privacy, and value in their next rental home. Enjoy the convenience of ample parking and a small private garden space.

üèôÔ∏è **Rental Advantage:** Situated in a well-connected area with easy access to markets, schools, hospitals, and public transport ‚Äì ideal for settling into the community.

üí∞ **Affordable Rent & Flexible Terms!**
üîπ Budget-friendly monthly rent (NPR 35,000/mo).
üîπ Options available for both long-term and potentially shorter-term rental agreements (inquire for details). Make this charming villa your rented home without breaking the bank.

title: Cozy Ground Floor Home for Rent
description:
Available for rent: A charming and cozy ground floor home (approx. 750 sq ft) in the highly convenient Sanepa neighborhood of Lalitpur. This single-floor rental features 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, making it ideal for couples, small families, or professionals seeking a comfortable and accessible living space. Comes semi-furnished, potentially saving you initial setup costs. Includes practical bike parking.

üîë **Rental Highlight:** Enjoy the ease of ground floor living in a sought-after location, perfect for those prioritizing convenience in their rental choice.

title: Luxury Villa Now Renting Near Patan Durbar
description:
Indulge in an unparalleled rental experience with this stunning 3-floor luxury villa, now available for rent near the historic Patan Durbar Square. Boasting over 3500 sq ft, this property features 5 spacious bedrooms, 4 modern bathrooms, elegant interiors, and the ultimate luxury: a private swimming pool. Essential amenities like secure garage parking and backup power ensure comfort and convenience for discerning renters.

üíé **Exclusive Rental:** Ideal for expatriate families, corporate rentals, or anyone seeking a high-end lifestyle rental in a prestigious Lalitpur location.

title: Elegant 3-Bed Apartment Rental in Thamel
description:
Secure your next rental in the heart of Kathmandu! This elegant 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment (approx. 1100 sq ft) is now available for rent in the vibrant Thamel area. Located on the 2nd floor, it offers private balcony access. The apartment comes unfurnished, providing a blank canvas for you to personalize your rented space. Enjoy close proximity to Thamel's famous shops, diverse restaurants, and lively nightlife. Convenient street parking is available nearby.

üö∂ **Renter's Dream Location:** Perfect for those who want to live amidst the energy and convenience of central Thamel.

title: Rent a Modern 2-Bed Apartment in Baneshwor
description:
Opportunity to rent a newly built, modern apartment in a prime New Baneshwor location! This stylish 5th-floor unit (approx. 950 sq ft) offers 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, perfect for professionals or small families. Enjoy rental convenience with included elevator access, a reserved parking space, a sleek modular kitchen, and reliable hot water. The apartment is semi-furnished and has AC available for added comfort.

‚ú® **Modern Rental Living:** Experience contemporary style and hassle-free amenities in one of Kathmandu's key residential and commercial hubs.

title: Spacious Family Home with Garden for Rent
description:
Make this large family home your next rental! Available now in the desirable Maharajgunj area, this spacious 2-floor house offers approximately 2500 sq ft of living space with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. A key highlight for renters is the beautiful, expansive private garden ‚Äì perfect for children, relaxation, or entertaining. The home is filled with ample sunlight and includes convenient driveway parking.

üå≥ **Ideal Family Rental:** Located in a peaceful and well-regarded neighborhood, offering plenty of room to grow and enjoy outdoor space, a rare find in city rentals.

title: Affordable Studio Flat for Rent in Kirtipur
description:
Looking for a budget-friendly rental? This compact studio flat (approx. 350 sq ft) on the 1st floor in Kirtipur is now available for rent at just NPR 18,000/mo. It features an open studio layout with a private bathroom and comes unfurnished. Its proximity to Tribhuvan University makes it an excellent rental choice for students, while also being suitable for single professionals seeking an economical living solution. Bike parking is available.

üéì **Smart Rental Choice:** An affordable and practical option, especially for those connected to TU or working in the Kirtipur area.

title: Rent a Charming Traditional House in Bhaktapur
description:
Experience authentic Newari culture by renting this charming traditional house (approx. 1200 sq ft across 3 floors) located near the historic Bhaktapur Durbar Square. This unique rental opportunity offers 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and features intricate traditional woodwork, providing a unique cultural ambiance. Benefit from reliable community water access. While direct parking isn't on-site, parking areas are conveniently located nearby for tenants.

üè∫ **Cultural Rental Experience:** Ideal for those seeking to immerse themselves in Bhaktapur's rich heritage and vibrant community life during their rental period.
